Room.Name: Mordith's Hut
Room.ShortDescription: This is the hut of Mordith, the middle daughter of Mehetable the witch.
Room.LongDescription: The room is simple but elegant, with many musical instruments in view. Mordith longs to be married, and her music is often about lost loves and forgotten promises. Her favorite instrument is the finely crafted lute you see on the chair by the window.
